eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: Lin Yühsia suspects the Sword Forge is related to the Messenger's murder, and entices Du Yaoye to investigate. Taihe secretly helps Zuo Le with tracking the Shanhaizhong's movements, but runs into an unusually powerful enemy.

attributes.content: The deed is still not done?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: There was some serious kung fu on both sides, so we had no chance to strike.
attributes.name: Malicious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Leave that young Candleholder to his own devices, he won't affect our plans.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: But the woman from Lungmen was never accounted for, and she's still after us.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: What a pain.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: We'll keep an eye on things, and make a move when the time is right.
attributes.name: Malicious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: No, after these two clashes, the mandarins will definitely be on alert, so we have to be more cautious.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: I can let the woman live for another two days, but our organization can leave no clues.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Right... Then what do we do now?
attributes.name: Malicious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Just wait. It won't be long before he gives us fresh orders.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: 'The mounts, seas, and all in between shall be our master's.'
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: They've stolen the land without even knowing it... the people will pay for their arrogance.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Soon.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: And who might you be waiting for?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Attempted assassination of a court official and disturbing the people's peace. Your conduct befouls the laws of Great Yan. It's like they mean nothing to you.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: You have two options.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Lay down your arms and come with me. Or I bring you in.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: You were followed.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: It's the same man from before.
attributes.name: Malicious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: He turned the tables on you. Considering his skill, it's no surprise you couldn't do anything about it.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: But in the end, it was still you who led this man here, do you understand?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Malicious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Good. Now, we'll get rid of him first, and then decide how to deal with you.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: You dare?!
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Late as it is, you're still awake?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: We must be vigilant, lest something like yesterday's incident happen again.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Surely the Grandmaster has not invited me out so late to enjoy the scenery?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: It's auspicious for Lord Wei to stand here with us at such a crucial moment. Indeed, it would have been best to take a stroll through the city of Yumen and enjoy its scenery.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The Lord Exorcist's decision naturally comes after careful consideration.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Perhaps this is not for me to say, but the Lord Exorcist's responsibilities reach far beyond the safety and security of Yumen.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The consequences of just one mishap are grave enough that the word 'trust' no longer carries much weight.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Indeed, it is so. General Zuo and I have worked together for decades, without relying on 'trust'.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I hope you understand.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Have I ever expressed any dissatisfaction?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Speaking of which, we have yet to properly catch up on each other's affairs.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The last time I came to Yumen was five years ago, and the time before that was ten, but both were hectic visits.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And our last meeting, let me think... we were in the capital.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Yes, the year you left the capital, I had happened to be there to report on my work.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I didn't expect you to remember something from so long ago.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Do you not remember it, Lord Wei?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I don't recall what year it was, exactly, but my memories tell me it was also spring then.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Late spring. A little later than the current season.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: That's it.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: At the time, you still wielded a sword... And you were not yet called 'Wei.'
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: There was much scenery to enjoy, and plenty of kung fu spectacles too. I have lived for so long, there are not many who leave a true impression.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: But even now, as I evaluate the various styles of kung fu, I still think about Chi Xiao's ultimate move.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I'm honored to win such a praise from the Grandmaster of kung fu.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: That night seemed like it was set to rain, the weather stifling, the clouds looming low.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I was on the keep, and far away, but even then I saw a light in the direction of the posthouse.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The sky abruptly broke with the chill of a sword. A sharp and decisive style of swordsmanship.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: 'As sword of stratus rent, once stood stand fast.'
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Afterwards, Lord Wei must have left the city. In the end, the rain did not fall.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: It was a very long time ago.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But I wonder why you're bringing this up?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The tower stands high, the two men's clothes rustle in the breeze.
Even though it is a windless night.
As far as the eye can see, Yumen's sentries and buildings stretch on without end. Only through the wind on the highest of points can one clearly perceive that the city is moving at a high speed.
There is treachery in the court, and minds can be unpredictable. Surely, no one understands this better than you.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: But I also believe that whose mind is consumed by ambition and cunning could never wield that style of swordsmanship.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: There is a matter that I would like you to help with.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I dare not refuse a request from the Grandmaster himself.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I would ask you to trust Yumen, just this once.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You and the Lord Exorcist are alike, shouldering the peace of Yan. There are many matters of concern... but in the end, Yumen is unlike Lungmen.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Yumen was built on strength of arms, and most of the people here practice kung fu. These people have great passion, but lack strategic thinking.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Regardless, everyone here acts for the country and its people, and there is nothing wrong with hating evil as an enemy.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I only fear that simple-minded people will be manipulated without their knowing.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: General Zuo has agreed to a time limit of three days. Within these three days, you will get your answer.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Until then, I hope you will set your grievances with the Lord Exorcist aside, and stay your hand.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: A guest must comply with his host, and the Lord Exorcist has asked me to wait in these barracks at ease. I simply wished to share his burden, but there is really nothing I can do.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I recall, that Envoy Lin of Lungmen from a few days past is indeed shrewd and capable, solving several cases cleanly in just a few days' work.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I imagine there must be several talents like her in your employ.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: ...You might be overthinking the situation.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Whether the Grand Tutor, the Lord Exorcist, or Wei Yenwu, every move is calculated for the safety of the people and prosperity of the country.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: There should be no conflict between us.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But looking back over the few millennia... there have been those who shared a goal, but a number of them inevitably break and even turn against each other, yes?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Indeed, you are most qualified to speak of this.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Very well, for your sake... I will agree to your request.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You have my thanks, Lord Wei.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The night is no longer young, I suggest you retire.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Oh, but... there is another thing, I think I have yet to mention.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: 'Cloud-splitting sword' is not actually Chi Xiao's ultimate move.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: (repressed gasping)
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Now, you still hold the option to surrender. Choose that option, or you will never stand again.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: (Anguished groaning)
attributes.name: Malicious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Right now it is merely at your waist, move again and the dirt will bury you up to your shoulders.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Three more of you lie in hiding in the alley on the left, and two more in the eaves on the right.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Your actions were to draw out my weakness and create an opportunity for an ambush.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: But you will not get such a chance.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I admit, I've underestimated your strength.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: It's rare... for one to be proficient in both kung fu and Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: You are unworthy to comment on my kung fu.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: ...Hmph.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Yesterday, Envoy Lin of the L.G.D. fended off an attack while returning to the city, and was followed today with errant intent. Earlier, a Sui Regulator Candleholder met with an assassin in the city center, these acts were most probably all your doing, correct?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: To intercept and kill a Catastrophe Messenger, to steal Catastrophe data, just what are the Shanhaizhong planning in Yumen?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Who exactly is behind you?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: You'd better check who's behind you first!
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: What—
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Thank... thank you very much for saving my life...
attributes.name: Malicious Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: I'm sorry for all that.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: You shouldn't be wasting your time here.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss?

attributes.content: The Lungmenite woman investigated the warehouse at the Sword Forge. She's making a lot of trouble...
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: If you're so worried about trouble, why not go directly to the only variable that can sway the whole situation?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: The old man at the Sword Forge.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Go find him, and let the Catastrophe data disappear along with his body.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Master, look out—
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: You shouldn't be able to stand.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Rest... go...
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The ground suddenly sinks beneath them, as if charged with vitality. The raised earth and rocks surround everyone in an instant.
Master, this man is not to be underestimated—
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: A cold light flashes for just a moment.
A man falls to the ground, earth and rock unmoving.
The block is dead silent.
Waste of time, and boring beyond comprehension.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Yühsia, what took you so long?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I happened to meet an acquaintance, so I took the chance to say hello.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You're a Lungmenite, and yet you seem to know plenty of people in Yumen...
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Well, that's enough talking. Let's piece together the information we gathered and see if we can figure anything out.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I didn't get to finish that conversation on the street, what progress have you made on your end?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Miss Du, what kind of person owns the Sword Forge?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You mean Uncle Meng?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: He's an old friend of my father's, from when he was still in the business. His kung fu is renowned, but he's good at talking too, and every martial artist in Yumen trusts him.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I'm not familiar with Yumen, so Xingyu Logistics being able to operate here is all thanks to him.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Does this stuff have anything to do with Uncle Meng?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Just wondering.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: If you have something to say, get to the point already!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I've had a suspicion that this band of thieves causing chaos in the city stowed away with the supplies smuggled from Lungmen.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I've been on the smugglers' trail and it led me to the Sword Forge's warehouse.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: So? What did you find?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: The warehouse had only iron billets and forge fuel. All the materials you would need for a forge.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What was strange was the warehouse guard.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: He had an unusual sunburn around his neck. Looked like a mark from wearing special protective equipment.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: As I understand it, the Catastrophe Survey Teams dispatched by the Imperial Astronomical Bureau trek through the desert for long periods of time, and they wear a standardized mask for protection against the wind and sun.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: That sunburn wasn't faded. And the Imperial Astronomical Bureau has only dispatched that one team lately.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: So you're saying there's something suspicious about the team, and that they're connected to Uncle Meng?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I'm trying to get us on the same page with the facts I've found.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Yumen has just returned from the depths of the desert, where the sunlight can be intense, and sunburns are common among the city residents.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Is that one little thing all you've got to make you suspicious?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Do you recognize this object?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: (voice shaking) Where did you find this?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: The warehouse.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I found it lying in a corner. It seemed unique, and was standing out from the piles of iron billets and fuel.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: This is a 'Xingyu Logistics' armband that I designed myself.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: The red armband is inlaid with gold trim, as well as a Shangshu-style embroidery of twin lines flowing through a pattern of five-pointed stars, symbolizing auspicious and smooth trade routes.
The signifiers of luck and peace are dyed a disturbing ochre-red, and the stains of yellow sand make it look mottled and old.
Only the kids who followed me to Yumen from Shangshu would have this. Did the Qis also...?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: If what befell the Messenger team happened outside Yumen, then this shouldn't have made it into the city at all!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Are the Qis still alive?! If they are, then why are they hiding? No, who's holding them and keeping them from showing themselves?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Uncle Meng? But doesn't he have four men he knows on the team.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Miss Du, let's not jump to conclusions just yet. We need to calmly analyze the...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: If I can't figure it out, then I might as well stop thinking. I'll just head to the Sword Forge and get my answer!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Miss Du!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Yühsia.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I saw a tourist dressed like a Lungmenite downstairs earlier, probably one of your men?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: He came to pass you something, right?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: That armband was evidence brought back from where the Messenger team was intercepted and killed outside the city.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You're using Miss Du.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: We have a lot of clues pointing us towards the Sword Forge right now, so we need to probe it a little.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: If the man is innocent, then we've ruled out a decent possibility, and she will also feel at ease.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: If there's really something up with the Sword Forge, won't you have put her in danger?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: She's certainly not the only one in danger here in Yumen.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Yühsia, I know you have your responsibilities, and maybe this is how you've always done things.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I'm not about to argue with you over what's right or wrong, but I can't agree with your approach.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I have to go help her.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Lord Zuo.
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: What happened?!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The tall Forte lies on the hospital bed, his visage pale. He's barely still breathing.
In Zuo Le's memories, Taihe was always like a mountain.
This mountain stood beside his father and himself, unshakeable.
What sort of force could break this mountain? Zuo Le has never considered such a possibility.
Monitor Censor Taihe was brought to a military camp by two civilians not long ago...
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: Tell me his condition first!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: T-The medics say they've managed to save his life... but perhaps only his life...
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: Monitor Censor Taihe has suffered multiple external injuries, but what's more serious is the damage to his organs. He has suffered massive internal bleeding. If he were an ordinary man, I'm afraid he would have already...
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: Uncle Taihe shouldn't have been involved in this, he was helping me under the table...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Where is Father?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The General is guarding the outer city tower.
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: I've also notified the General, and there were only four words in his reply.
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: 'Stay at your post.'
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry

attributes.content: Where are the ones who brought Uncle Taihe here?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Tell me the truth.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We just saw the Forte dressed in mandarin clothes lying by the roadside. We have no idea what happened, but we figured we should bring him over here...
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: The city is under high alert right now. What were you doing out so late at night?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We had trouble sleeping, so we went out for a walk... who would've thought there would be someone lying by the roadside as soon as we went out? Terrifying.
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: So you live in the area, but heard nothing strange?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Nothing...
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: Where did you find the wounded?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: In the south of the city, near the Sword Forge's alley!
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: The Sword Forge...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Sorry... Can I can go home now?
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Your testimony is unclear, so as a witness, you can't leave just yet.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Ah, w-well...
attributes.name: Nervous Passerby

attributes.content: Millenion.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Present.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: I'm moving out. Gather your team.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Search the Sword Forge.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Sir... The General's orders were to stick to our posts.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Father ordered me to hunt down the assassin and locate the sword in three days to restore peace in Yumen. Even with his strength, Monitor Censor Taihe has been gravely injured. This surely has some link to the Feranmut followers.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Going to the scene of the crime to find the truth and arrest the culprit, is that not sticking to my post?!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Go.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Millenion
